name: unproduced
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
An unproduced play, film, etc. has been written, but not performed or filmed: an unproduced screenplay/script/play She later worked on an, as yet, unproduced sequel to the film. See also
produce
More examplesFewer examplesHe was a compulsive writer but many of his scripts remained sadly unproduced.The competition invites playwrights to submit previously unproduced one-act plays.They spent a couple of lean years working on various unproduced projects.His screenplay for "The Lookout" was long considered one of Hollywood's great unproduced scripts.
